GT-king
GT-king Pro
GS-king X
Boot
1. Power on and power on automatically after power off \n 2. With the power on, point the remote control at the TV box and press the power button on the remote control to turn it on.
Shutdown

1. When turning on, point the remote control at the TV box and press the power button on the remote control to turn off \n 2. When powering on, use the flying mouse cursor to click the power button in the lower-left corner of the main interface to shut down.
Remote control pairing
At the same time, press the “back button” and “ok” on the remote control, the indicator light flashes, and after about 4 seconds, the remote control pairing is completed.
Voice input method
Press and hold the voice button, the indicator light is green. Do not release the voice button when the screen says “listening...”, just say the function you need.
How to open and close the flying mouse function
Press the mouse button to open/close the flying mouse function
Bluetooth pairing

After turning on the Bluetooth in the settings, turning on the Bluetooth switch, the box will automatically detect the nearby connected Bluetooth devices, and mouse click it will automatically recognize the connection.
WiFi connection
In the network and Internet in the settings, turn on WLAN, click WLAN and select the WIFI you want to connect
Portable hotspot
When connected to the Ethernet, open the "Network and Internet" in the settings to enter the portable hotspot function, you can open the portable hotspot.
Sound
Use VOL + and VOL- on the remote control to adjust the volume, or enter Settings-Sound to adjust the media volume and notification volume \"
1 Installation and removal of hard drives
1.1 Use the screws to lock the hard disk bracket on both sides of the hard disk.
1.1.1 Side view:
1.1.2 Top view:

1.2 Push the installed hard disk interface into the device in the direction of the arrow along the track of the bracket, push it to the end, and then lock the back cover screw to complete the installation.
1.3 Open the back cover, insert the tool between the two hard disks, hook one end of the hard disk, and pull it out to complete the removal.
2 Hard disk formatting/initialization setting steps
Hard disk format / initialization two kinds of setting state: 1. Air mouse state setting 2. No Air mouse state.\nSetting Tips: Air mouse state setting is more convenient.

Remind:

 1. When connecting to a new hard disk for the first time, the hard disk information can not be read, display unformatted or uninitialize, need to format / initialize the hard disk settings in order to read and use properly.

 2. Some branded hard drives under Android can not be formatted / initialized. Please complete formatting / initialization on the Windows system then use it.

 3. If you need to partition the hard disk, please complete the partition on the window system and then use it.
2.1 Air mouse state setting step
Note:***** USB drive, * represents the name of the hard disk
2.1.1 Press the Air mouse button on the remote control, pull out the top drop-down window,click "Click to format or initialize"
2.1.2 Click "PORTABLE STORAGE"
2.1.3 Pop Up"Format or Initialize this USB drive?" Click"FORMAT OR INTIALIZE USB DRIVE"
2.1.4 Please do not remove the pop-up window of formatting / initializing USB storage progress.
2.1.5 Pop-up "Your USB drive is ready to use", hard disk format /Initialization complete.
2.2 No Air mouse state setting step
2.2.1 Enter "Settings"
2.2.2 Click "Storage"
2.2.3 Click "******USB DRIVE Unformatted or uninitialized"
2.2.4 After pop up"This ****** USB drive Unformatted or uninitialized",click "SET UP"
2.2.5 The following steps are same as Air mouse state setting step 2.1.2 ~ 2.1.5

2.1.2 Click "PORTABLE STORAGE"

2.1.3 Pop Up"Format or Initialize this USB drive?" Click"FORMAT OR INTIALIZE USB DRIVE"

2.1.4 Please do not remove the pop-up window of formatting / initializing USB storage progress.

2.1.5 Pop-up "Your USB drive is ready to use", hard disk format /Initialization complete.
Note:The hard disk that has been formatted / initialized will display the usage status and capacity of the hard disk.
3 Hard disk safe exit steps:
1.Before unplugging the hard disk, select "Settings" >, "Device Preferences" >, "Storage " >, "storage device" > "Eject", the storage device shows safety pop up, and then unplug the hard disk.
Tips: NO Hot Swap!
Audio Output
OK
1.HDMI
2.SPDIF
3.AV
4.HIFI SOUND
Corresponding audio interface
Audio settings and interface audio output
HDMI:HDMI port Audio output
SPDIF:SPDIF port Audio output
AV:AV port Audio output
HiFi SOUND:Headphone jack、RCA output port、Balance output port Audio output
Resolution
In the settings, find Droid Settings to open and enter the display menu. After finding the screen resolution, you only need to turn on the automatic switching of the optimal screen resolution.
Wallpaper
1. On the main interface, press the menu button on the remote control to select a preset theme background picture. \n 2. Settings-Display-Wallpaper, choose the wallpaper you want in the photo
Favorite apps
You can add your favorite apps to your desktop by clicking the "+/-" symbol in the blank page at the top right of the screen.
Sleep

Set your own sleep time from “Settings” - “Display” - “Sleep”. After the setting is successful, the box will enter the sleep mode within the set time. If you need to turn off the sleep mode, you need to find the version number from "Settings" - "System" - "About the device", then left click this option to open the developer option 5 times or more. The developer option can be clicked once to return to the "System" interface, and the "Developer Options" can be found in the system interface. After the developer option is turned on, the screen sleep mode can be turned off directly from the "No Lock Screen".
Font size
The font size can be adjusted by dragging to a small dot on the progress bar after "Settings" - "Display" - "Font Size".
Language
Click on Settings, find "Device Preferences" in the settings and click on this option to find the "Language" option. Languages ​​can be changed in the language options.
Uninstall software
When you need to uninstall a software, right-click the function and the uninstall option will appear after about 2 seconds.
Language modification failure

After switching on, the language of the system becomes Korean, and the language selection is invalid. Please turn off the language switching function in the HDMI CEC function, and then switch the language again.
How to modify the power button customization
Settings-Droid settings, open the power button definition, select the function you want to set the power button
Lighthome failure
Lighthome failure.
Box time is not accurate
Settings -> Device Preferences -> Time and Date -> Automatically determine the date and time -> Use the time provided by the network.
How to make an OTA update
Settings-System-System Update, click Detect Update to see if there is a new OTA push upgrade or click the upper right corner to select the local upgrade
How to install new firmware
USB cable brush tutorial: Need to prepare the hardware: computer, USB cable .
1.Download the burn tool, follow the wizard prompts to install and complete, the icon should be appears on your desktop
2.Download the firmware and save it to your desktop for easy access
3.Right click "Run as administrator"
4.Enter the brush tool interface.
5.Click File in the upper left corner and select Import image .
6.Load the firmware, click Import image to enter, find the downloaded USB firmware location, select and open
7.After the image checking disappears, the brush package is loaded completely, then click Start.

8.Plug the Type A USB male to male ends into the USB port of the computer, plug the power adapter into the socket, and insert the power adapter and the male to male USB port into the corresponding port of the GT-King at the same time (Note: the GT-King port must be inserted at the same time, otherwise Unable to read firmware properly).
9.Waiting for the loading interface to appear.
10.After loading, unplug the USB cable and power cable from the box, click stop, close the tool, and finish the brush..
SD card brush tutorial Need to prepare the brush hardware: SD card.
1.Copy the already loaded SD card flasher firmware into the SD card root directory (the SD card format must be FAT32).
2.Insert the SD card into the SD card slot, plug in the HDMI cable, connect the monitor, plug in the power and turn it on.
3.Go to the home page, click UPDATE icon enter the application page
4.Click "UPDATE BACKUP" and open it.
Check "Wipe Data"" and "Wipe Media" (if you need to wape data), then click "Select" button.
6.Select the zip file that you download from PC.
7.Click the "Update" button to start the upgrade.
8.Wait for the upgrade to complete.
This is a wireless flying mouse with a built-in 6-axis gyroscope sensor and high-fidelity voice input.
The plug-and-play miniature receiver,Suitable for computer, projector, TV set-top box, HTPC.

Holding air mouse and rotating your wrist IS converted into a movement of a cursor across the screen and It allows you to control your computer,projector and other entertainment equipment from a distance.

Ergonomics of air mouse will replace stationary computer mouse and infrared button remote control giving you convenience to manage your computer and television set from a position which is most comfortable for you.
How to Use：

The control device needs a Bluetooth or infrared receiver. When the Bluetooth is not connected, the remote control sends related key values through infrared, and after Bluetooth is connected, the key values are sent through Bluetooth. The flying mouse and voice functions cannot be used when Bluetooth is not connected.
1.Bluetooth / infrared voice flying mouse remote control pairing method

For the first boot, press and hold the combination key (Page UP key and Volume + key) on the remote control for 5 seconds to enter in pairing mode. After entering the pairing mode, the light on the remote control will flash quickly, and the remote control can be searched on the operated device with the name (Beelink_AirW), wil be ready to use after pairing.Move the Fly Mouse, the cursor will move on the screen,Means pairing was successful.
2. 2.4G wireless voice flying mouse remote control pairing method

Disconnect the USB receiving head of the operated device, plug in the USB receiving head, and wave the mouse. The cursor will move on the screen to indicate that the pairing is successful. If the pairing is unsuccessful, press the "back button" and "OK" keys on the remote control at the same time. After 4 seconds, the indicator flashes. When the red light stops flashing, the pairing is successful and you can start using it.
Air Mouse has 3 levels of cursor speed.
1. Bluetooth / infrared voice flying mouse remote control adjustment method
Mouse speed changed from slow to fast: Press "OK" and "Page UP" simultaneously for three seconds, the cursor speed becomes faster.
Mouse speed changed from fast to slow: Press "OK" and "Page DOWN" simultaneously for three seconds, the cursor speed becomes slower.
2. 2.4G wireless voice flying mouse remote control adjustment method
Mouse speed from slow to fast: Press the "OK" and "Volume +" keys at the same time, the cursor speed will become faster.
Mouse speed changed from fast to slow: Press the "OK" and "Volume-" keys at the same time, the cursor speed becomes slower.
Function Keys :
Home: Go back to the home;
Return: Go back to previous screen;
OK: Confirm action or insert cursor;
Cursor Locking: Press to lock the air mouse, press again to unLock
Voice Switch:
Press and hold "Voice Switch" to turn on voice channel.Release the key to turn off voice channel.
Low battery reminder:

When the product\'s AAA battery is low, LED light flashes slowly (after pressing a button during release and releasing it, if the battery level is detected to be low, the LED light will flash once a second and five times to indicate that the battery level is too low and the battery needs to be replaced) The battery needs to be replaced.
Sensor calibration:
1.Bluetooth / Infrared Voice Flying Mouse Remote Control Calibration Method

For the first use of the Fly Mouse function, you need to perform calibration: press the Fly Mouse key and the Menu key for more than 3s at the same time, and the indicator light enters the fast flashing state. At this time, enter the Fly mouse calibration mode, place the remote control on the desktop, wait for the Fly mouse to calibrate. The indicator no longer blinks and calibration is complete.
2. 2.4G wireless voice flying mouse remote control calibration method

The changes of voltage and temperature may make the cursor drifts,In this case, put the mouse flat on the desk and remain still. You can complete calibration by pressing any key to wake it up when it is in hibernation mode.
Product specifications：
Transmission method: Bluetooth and infrared \/ infrared and 2.4G wireless
Sensors: 6 axis Gyroscope
Number of keys: 17
Range:>10m
Battery Type: AAA*2
Material: ABS Plastic and silicone
Weight：50g
Note:
1.Non-professional are prohibited to use the test mode of the product.
2. Under a normal use, if the indicator is always on or other abnormal conditions, you can restore it by reinstalling the batterys.
